description: This file contains data transfer objects (DTOs) and request models related to social media account management, scheduling, analytics, and automation rules within the social media management platform.

classes.name: ConnectAccountRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to connect a social media account with provider information and tokens.

classes.name: SocialAccountDto
classes.description: Data transfer object for social account details.

classes.name: SchedulePostRequest
classes.description: Request model for scheduling a social media post.

classes.name: ScheduledPostDto
classes.description: DTO for representing a scheduled post with status and details.

classes.name: PublishedPostDto
classes.description: DTO for a post that has been published, including engagement metrics.

classes.name: AnalyticsSummaryDto
classes.description: DTO summarizing analytics metrics across accounts.

classes.name: ChartPointDto
classes.description: Represents a data point for analytics charts.

classes.name: AutomationRuleRequest
classes.description: Model for creating or updating an automation rule.

classes.name: AutomationRuleDto
classes.description: DTO representing an automation rule with metadata.
